metadata.title: CVE-2011-1145 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
The SQLDriverConnect() function in unixODBC before 2.2.14p2 have a possiblebuffer overflow condition when specifying a large value for SAVEFILEparameter in the connection string.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2011-1145` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libodbc1 - 2.2.14p2-5ubuntu2
odbcinst - 2.2.14p2-5ubuntu2
odbcinst1debian2 - 2.2.14p2-5ubuntu2
unixodbc - 2.2.14p2-5ubuntu2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: unixodbc package in trusty/esm, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.14p2-5ubuntu2').
